TextLibrary.Text: Your friend came here a year ago. Disgraced himself in prison. Sent here for hard labor.
Your friend came here a year ago. Disgraced himself in prison. Sent here for hard labor.
What's it worth to get him out?
What's it worth to get him out?
You'd be surprised. Give me a number. We'll make it worth your while.
You'd be surprised. Give me a number. We'll make it worth your while.
Not money. In this backwater I need supplies. Call me later. My name is Gorn. I'll give you a list.
Not money. In this backwater I need supplies. Call me later. My name is Gorn. I'll give you a list.
